items.text: Poll Description Field — Optional multiline description in poll creation modal
Number & Star Emojis — Auto-prefix options with 1️⃣ 2️⃣ 3️⃣ or ⭐⭐⭐ for visual clarity
Maybe Toggle — Optional 'Include Maybe' checkbox for Yes/No polls
Results Modal — 'Results' button in /askify list to view poll results in a modal
Date Range Filtering — Filter polls by 7d, 30d, or YYYY-MM-DD YYYY-MM-DD
Poll Creation Modal UX — Radio buttons for Poll Type and Post Timing
Enhanced Poll List — Shows all statuses (active, scheduled, closed) with enriched poll cards
